snippet.title: DISTRAINT - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
DISTRAINT is an upcoming 2D psychological horror adventure game for PC which will be released at Halloween. 

You step into the shoes of an ambitious young man named Price.

In order to forge a partnership from a famous company, Price seizes a property of an elderly woman.
In that very moment he finds out the price of his humanity.

This is his story and the tale of his regrets... 

_______________________________________________________

DISTRAINT is now on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/395170

To follow the progress please visit the homepage:
http://www.distraintgame.com
